job.title: Telemedicine App with AI integrations and HIPAA compliance with C#, .NET, MS Azure Cloud and Angular

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a highly skilled developer to join our team and help us create a telemedicine app with AI integrations and ensure HIPAA compliance. The app will be built using C#, .NET, MS Azure Cloud, and Angular.

The ideal candidate will have experience in web development, API integration, .NET Framework, and healthcare industry. Proficiency in JavaScript, Angular, and C# is a must.

The project is expected to last for more than 6 months. We are seeking a candidate who can take ownership of the project, contribute innovative ideas, and deliver high-quality code.

To apply for this job, please submit a detailed proposal describing how you can help with the project. We would also appreciate if you could provide links to some of your past completed projects that showcase your skills and experience in telemedicine app development and HIPAA compliance.
customFields.inputsTitleAI: Telemedicine App with AI integrations and HIPAA compliance with C#, .NET, MS Azure Cloud and Angular
